abstract: Ibrahim Afellay (born 2 April 1986) is a Dutch footballer who plays for FC Barcelona in La Liga as an attacking midfielder or winger.He played youth football at Elinkwijk before joining the PSV youth academy at age 10. After debuting in 2004, he represented PSV for eight seasons. Making his Netherlands national team debut in 2007, Afellay appeared at the 2010 World Cup, contributing to the Dutch side's second place in the tournament. He was also present at Euro 2008 and Euro 2012.
